Name: SprintVelocity
Description: Average story points completed per sprint

Name: BlockerResolutionTime
Description: Time (in hours) to resolve a blocker

Name: TeamSize
Description: Number of members in a team

Name: EmployeeAvailability
Description: Percentage availability of an employee during sprint

Name: FeaturePriority
Description: Priority value assigned to a feature

Name: TaskBlockerCount
Description: Number of blockers assigned to a task

Name: BacklogItemCount
Description: Number of items in the product backlog

Name: TeamSatisfactionScore
Description: Satisfaction score collected during sprint retrospective
